text: I am having trouble recalling why this was. I would like to put a note in the docstring of the dataset fetcher in order to keep people from thinking they are doing something wrong. Was it broken or completely unavailable upstream already?
title: Haxby2001 Anat missing for Subject 6

text:
> Was it broken or completely unavailable upstream already?

I believe that's the case: it's an upstream problem.
